venue.address_2: DESK Central Kitchen, Dining Hall & Food Pantry
venue.name: Downtown Area Soup Kitchen

item.description:
Volunteers needed! As part of the United Way's "Days of Caring", the Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen (DESK) is seeking volunteers to help on Sunday, September 9th between 5pm and 7pm in serving free nutritious meals to homeless individuals and families, and the working and non-working poor of the Greater New Haven area.

For more information on the Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen and this project in particular, click here. You can also contact Jeanne May, Director of Community Outreach, for more information at 203-809-8770.

Please take a moment to register for this project through this website, in addition to RSVP'ing here. Also, please RSVP "Yes" only if you know you can definitely be there. If scheduling is a problem, there are literally dozens of volunteer opportunities available in the next few weeks as part of the "Days of Caring." To see more volunteer opportunities, click here.

Your NHC contact for this event is our man at the United Way of Greater New Haven, J.R. He can be reached at 248-563-4557
item.name: Sun. 9/9 - Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen
